title: Palatial Italy Coastal Luxury near San Marino with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktail
description:
With its regal facade, carved marble interiors and magnificent Venini chandeliers, the Palace Hotel is a neoclassic masterpiece promising true Italian indulgence. Head straight to the pool terrace for sun-soaked bliss, dine at I Venini Restaurant - where fresh fish and homemade pasta take centre stage - or rejuvenate body and mind at Dolce Vita Spa.

Perfectly positioned in the heart of Milano Marittima, this hotel is a beacon of coastal magic. It's just moments from trendy Papeete Beach and offers easy access to cultural landmarks like Italy in Miniature, only a 30-minute drive away, and the microstate of San Marino, perched on the slopes of Mount Titano.
offer_address: Viale Due Giugno 60, Milano Marittima 48015, Italy
